articles.description: McKinnon was showcased in the cold open, playing her recurring character Mrs. Rafferty, who is frequently abducted by aliens.
articles.content:
“Saturday Night Live” kicked off its season finale with a nod to departing cast members Pete Davidson and Kate McKinnon.
McKinnon was showcased in the cold open, playing her recurring character Mrs.… [+6023 chars]
